ai.summary: A short, easy 1.4 km stroll along Dog Kennel Lane in the UK. This beginner-friendly route follows a rural lane, ideal for families and casual walkers seeking a quick outdoor experience with modest scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with mixed surface types on a rural lane (tarmac and compact gravel). Expect hedgerows, grass verges, and occasional mud after rain; surfaces are generally level and easy to navigate.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and wear sturdy footwear. Stay to the left on the lane and be aware of passing vehicles. Keep dogs on a leash, watch for livestock or farm traffic, and carry a small map or phone with enough battery. Bring water and a light layer for changing conditions.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Hat and sunscreen in sunny weather
Map or fully charged phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal for comfortable conditions; walking is possible year-round in the UK, but winter may be muddy or icy.

seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 1.4 km hike along Dog Kennel Lane in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and essential gear for a short countryside walk.
